content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, nice to meet you. I am not interested in reducing the price. I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Let's negotiate the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal is to get the lowest price possible. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
